RegionPush.Title: [EN] Honkai: Star Rail Launch 'Global Distribution' error
RegionPush.Message:
Heyya Trailblazers!
We have noticed that on the latest update for HSR, there is a chance that your game will not start and give out 'Global Distribution' error. We have worked on the issue for next update of HSR but if you currently still can't open the game, click the button below for the workaround.
